But the noise level was acceptable and service was prompt. The wine prices are outrageous, I must say that! A small glass of the 'house' red was $10, and there was very little under that. 9 oz. glasses were upwards of $18-20! Menu was very good, specials looked very interesting. My young son was not impressed by the kids menu and ordered a calamari/shrimp dish off the specials, intended to be an appetizer. Older son thought it looked interesting so he ordered that as well. I thought being an app it would not be enough but it was a very generous portion of lightly breaded seafood, served on a bed of greens and peppers. I tried it and it was really good. Many items are offered as a 'lighter' version, and as everything is prepared to order, they are able to meet most requests for changes. I ordered the lighter version of

review.title: Maggiano's - Cherry Hill - Cherry Hill
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: I have an issue with the wait time for reserved tables. Why if you make a reservation would you, even after getting to the restaurant 15 minutes earlier than the reserved time, have to wait an additional 40 minutes. I assumed that the reservation meant they knew you were going to be there, and would have a table ready at least within a 15 minute time frame.

review.title: Maggiano's - Cherry Hill - Cherry Hill
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: Our server was very helpful. When my food came to the table cold, he took it back immediately and sent the manager to our table. Dinner was delicious.

review.title: Maggiano's - Cherry Hill - Cherry Hill
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: Parking was horrible including valet. Took 20 mins to get car at the end from valet. Could not relax as i felt they wanted us out of there in order to sit the next reservation. Paid outrageous price for low cost wine. Server was good but clearly could tell hi job was to get us in and out. Not an enjoyable experience.

review.title: Maggiano's - Cherry Hill - Cherry Hill
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: This food is a high quality , we enjoyed our Experience and look forward to trying other Items on the menu.

review.title: Maggiano's - Cherry Hill - Cherry Hill
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: Our visit was a nice experience. I went online & made our reservation, so when we got there we only had a short wait till our table was ready. We had a two sitter booth that was comfortable & cozy. The waitress was very nice & informative, she had a lot of knowledge about the different drinks & food. The food is reasonably priced & is very tasty. We have told many people about Maggiano's. We've been coming there for several years & hope to continue doing so. Thank you again for a great dining experience.

review.title: Maggiano's - Cherry Hill - Cherry Hill
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: always great food; service was inattentive and lacking this time

review.title: Maggiano's - Cherry Hill - Cherry Hill
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: Food was great. But I made a revservation for 5 and still was told I had to wait with a buzzer. Wasn't happy. Then when I got a table my party of 5 was squeezed into a corner booth for 4. Again not happy. Then when we asked for another table we get a small round table that was right in the way of people walking. I had to open the leaf up for more room to fit the food. Also when they came to serve the food they were so much in a hurry the food was almost just thrown on the table. Not sure I would want to go back with service like that.

review.title: Maggiano's - Cherry Hill - Cherry Hill
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: This was my first time at Maggiano's. I've heard that they have good food but that was an under statement. The food was excellent. They give you more than enough food and it tastes so good. The waiter was very nice also. I recommend it to anyone who loves Italian cuisine.

review.title: Maggiano's - Cherry Hill - Cherry Hill
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: Ellie & I always dine at Maggiano's in Cherrry Hill, NJ after Sunday mass around 12pm. We were greeted by Allen & Chelsea and served by Desiree. Also, Walter, Jessica, Emily, Christine, Sebastian, the bar tender Chris and the mgr Chris all stopped to say hello! Amanda has a wonderful staff! Her mgrs. Lauren, Chris, Michael & Jason have the restaurant running smoothly. Service is excellent and the food - just like Mom's! Cucina di Mama! Mom's Kitchen!! We miss seeing Patrick, Katie, Kyle & Bill. Ellie & I are always very grateful to the wonderful staff at Maggiano's and the well prepared entrees by the chefs! The restaurant is beautiful and a true delight to dine in. At this time we wish everyone a wonderful Easter and we'll see you all in two weeks! Ellie & Mario

review.title: Maggiano's - Cherry Hill - Cherry Hill
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: We went to Maggiano's to celebrate my daughter's birthday. The food was great. Our server Samantha was friendly and went out of her way to make the evening special. I would go again.

review.title: Maggiano's - Cherry Hill - Cherry Hill
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: Our waiter was very good to us. He didn't rush us and kept the food coming. He had a great personality. The food was delicious. My two granddaughters were with us and one of them never eats too much but she was really filling up on all the good food!

review.title: Maggiano's - Cherry Hill - Cherry Hill
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: It's a great place for families, couples or groups. Food is always delicious and service top notch! We celebrated my son's 21st birthday there and our waiter was magnificent!

review.title: Maggiano's - Cherry Hill - Cherry Hill
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: Driving was horrible but we made it. Hostess were ready and waiting when we got her. Very friendly Hostess and Host. Our waiter Sebastian was excellent and very caring to make sure we had everything we needed. Due to the weather it wasn't that crowd and I am so glad I didn't cancel. Everything was perfect

review.title: Maggiano's - Cherry Hill - Cherry Hill
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: You can't beat the deals they have with eat one meal, take one home.

review.title: Maggiano's - Cherry Hill - Cherry Hill
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: Always love the food. Went on a Sunday night (super bowl) for dinner and got seated right away. Food and service was great.

review.title: Maggiano's - Cherry Hill - Cherry Hill
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: Food was excellent and abundant - good value. Restaurant is very noisy - not a "romantic" destination, but fun for lively groups. Server was attentive and friendly, but not overbearing. Food is cooked to order so any dish can be customized - gluten free, dairy free, add/remove different ingredients from any dish, etc. Portions are large enough that each one in our party of 4 took leftovers home. Desserts are large enough to share (I wish we had known that before we ordered!) Reservations are a must for a Saturday night, and should be made early in the week to get the time you want. We were seated right at our reservation time - others without reservations had a long wait. Pricing is comparable with other nice restaurants in the Cherry Hill NJ area.

review.title: Maggiano's - Cherry Hill - Cherry Hill
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: We had the NICEST server, named Kyle and the Best manager, Leslieâ€¦ They made our night! The food was ok, but the kindness of our server really made it for usâ€¦

review.title: Maggiano's - Cherry Hill - Cherry Hill
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: Never disappointed with the food. It can get a bit pricey though, so my family usually only goes for extra special occasions.

review.title: Maggiano's - Cherry Hill - Cherry Hill
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: Great service and good food. Very enjoyable evening for a special birthday celebration.

review.title: Maggiano's - Cherry Hill - Cherry Hill
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: I, typically, stay away from any sort of "chain"restaurant, but a friend said he'd had good experiences there, so we decided to give Maggio a try. The pasta was real good, the sauces were flavorful. Shrimp were crisp and nor overcooked. And the salads were fresh and dressings creative. Best of all was the service which was pleasant and efficient but not intrusive. This is a good, local place to have dinner.

review.title: Maggiano's - Cherry Hill - Cherry Hill
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: Meal was good however there was a pricing discrepancy. Menu has special price posted as one price and our bill had it priced $8 more. We were told it was the lunch menu? Not possible since it was attached to the actual menu. Our server wasn't near when we noticed the price error and when we questioned another server she said she charged someone the same higher amount. It was 6:30pm no where near lunchtime. That's deceiving.

review.title: Maggiano's - Cherry Hill - Cherry Hill
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: Maggianos used to have great food, on my last two visits the food has been horrible... I will no longer dine here.... plus $70 for 3 to have lunch that wasnt good at all is a total waste of money.... 1 spaghetti n meatballs (one to go) 12.95, 2 chicken parmesan platters 15.95... 3 sodas tax n tip... NOT WORTH IT AT ALL

attributes.title: Maggiano's - Cherry Hill Details
attributes.author: OpenTable.com
attributes.attr: Public bus stops at the mall. One block away there is a bus that takes guests to the trains.

text.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
text.author: OpenTable.com
text.body: Maggiano?s lets you take a step back in time and enjoy the nostalgic atmosphere reminiscent of the Golden Age of Little Italy?truly made-from-scratch food served family-style, red-checked tablecloths, family portraits, leather banquettes & richly polished mahogany wood provide a warm ambiance & welcome you to an atmosphere where you will enjoy a unique dining experience.

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: 5 stars for everything! Our server was Christina, and she made our experience even better! Frequent diner just when you think you've had the best time she always takes it a step up!

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: I definitely would return to try more dishes. Service was well-timed and friendly, wines were affordable. Would always return

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: We had a very good dinner at Maggiano's - Orlando. Our party of four opted not to order the "Family style" dining and we do not have regrets. The "Family style" is a huge amount of food. It would be fine for those who have the ability to store and reheat all of the leftovers from such a feast. It was not a practical option for those staying in a nonsuite type hotel. As for what we did order, the lasagna, lobster carbonera, veal marsala and chicken francese were all well prepared and delicious. Our starter salads were well made with fresh ingredients. The special dessert was a great way to end our meal. Service was solid throughout our meal. Overall, we would recommend dining at Maggiano's.

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: When we made our Open Table reservation, in the comment section we wrote one of our party was celebrating a new belt in martial arts - nothing more. At the end of the meal a plate arrived with cookies, cream and candles and around the plate were written (in caramel and fudge) words of congratulations and encouragement. Very nice, completely unexpected. So, A+ on service this time around.

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: We go here every year when we are in Florida on Spring Break! The food is outstanding, the service is great and the environment is excellent. I highly recommend it!!!

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: The ambiance, service and food were impeccable! Thank you to our server Ian for a memorable experience! You truly exemplify what the art of service should be in the restaurant industry. Though it was not on the menu, a simple request for horseradish was met with the Chef skillfully creating a white truffle horseradish sauce made to accompany our meal. It was truly special and amazingly delicious. Thank you Matt Rando, the Banquet Operations Manager for your kind words of congratulations. Maggiano's of Little Italy at Point Orlando, we will definitely be going back - "Hungry for More"!

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: We loved our experience at maggianos, food was amazing , even had gluten free options, big plus for us, service was excellent in a very busy restaurant , will definitely be returning and would recommend it to all, it's our new favourite on international drive!

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: great food, the eggplant was fantastic with good sauce, service is excellant.

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: This is not a place for a quiet romantic dinner. It is very lively and fairly loud place. Your plates will be huge but good! You will definitely have enough for a second meal the next day! The quality of the food is very good? We enjoyed the food. As for service, it was great and our server was very nice and really attentive to our needs. I would definitely go back!

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: Very disappointing experience in Orlando. We got seated and finally the meal was complete after 2.5 hours. Very disorganized and staff just didn't seem to care. We order family style and we had to beg them to bring more. From past experiences at other location this one really sticks out very negative. Everything was a hassle. For this price range I should not have to be treated this way. We ran out of water and 20 minutes later after asking it finally showed up. I would not recommend this location.

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: First, I was disappointed to see this Maggiano's in Orlando had to be asked to "honor" the take one home specials as advertised on the Maggiano's website. This was not only offered, but encouraged when we visited the Phoenix restaurant! Food was very delicious. Bus person knocked over my friend's cocktail and his solution was to drop two napkins over the 24-inch pomegranate wet circle and walk away. Later, I asked the waiter if he knew about it and he did not. Only upon request was the cocktail (had been nearly full) replaced. Tablecloth was never changed. That really altered my friend's "birthday girl" feeling and my joy of treating her.

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: Don't forget to book as this restaurant is always packed with long waits - 90 minutes on the evening we visited. It's reputation is well deserved, with excellent food served fresh and in good sized portions. Staff are always friendly without being pushy. Always on our "must visit" list when we're in the area.

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: The food is always amazing and the staff is excellent; it's one of our favorite places to eat! The Martini's are excellent, too! ï¿½

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: My wife and I had dinner for my birthday last Friday night. Had a great meal once again. We requested one of their small booths in the dining room via the open table requests and Maggiano's came through. Service was top notch. My only complaint is that the noise level can get a little high when they are really busy. They have small deserts that are just the right size. Maggiano's portions are generally large so you might want to pick the lighter size when available.

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: Plenty of food and you always take home several "doggiebags"

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: Great service and great food! Would highly recomment this restaurant!

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: We love Maggiano's. The food, service, and atmosphere are always so good that it is hard to believe that this is a chain restaurant. Whenever we have out of town visitors, we make sure that a trip to Maggiano's is on the list of things to do. In fact, before we moved to Orlando, it was always a must on our frequent visits. One suggestion: dinner is usually hectic, noisy, and crowded. Lunch has the same excellent food without the large crowds. Convenient location on the I-drive near the convention center, I-4, and Sand Lake Rd.

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: We went on Valentine's day and we had a reservation took us right in. The waitress was very helpful and kind. We loved the food. Would go back anytime.

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: Great food and wine. Desserts were fantastic too. First night with a group of twelve at a perfectly sized round table. Second night with bride and 8 year old spawn. Won't skip it next month when we are back here.

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: Our waiter was very attentive, food kept coming, food was excellent as close to my Italian grandmother's cooking. Love the choices and the amount of food served love that you can chose a variety.

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: We always include this restaurant on our list because of the buy one take one home. It is a great way to have 2 meals for the price of one. We go here early in our trip for this reason. Great food , great service , & great staff.

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: Staff very nice. Food good. Very busy even on a Monday night. A little loud for our liking.

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: twice in orlando this and no let down i will be going back again this year few more times

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: One of the few places where everything matches! Awesome experience!

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: This was a last minute idea after being in the "Disney" bubble for a week. Was totally worth the drive! Food and atmosphere were excellent as was the wait staff. Will definitely return when in this area again.

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: We had dinner here as a party of 6 (2 adults, 4 kids). They were very busy but our wait was minimal and our service excellent. We chose the family style menu. All our choices were great and there was plenty of food. Would love to go back when in Orlando.

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: As always, maggianos doesn't dissapoint! Always great always fresh!

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: Waiter was amazing even brought complimentary Dessert for our honeymoon!

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: After a disappointing Christmas Eve dinner back a few months ago we decided to give it another try. Food was awesome but our server Marissa was the best we've seen since moving to Orlando!

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: We lived eveything about this place, very good location, the staf was very nice. Food was not the best ive had but very good. Definitely i would recommend this place to a friend.

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: as usual very good took my aunt and uncle and they loved it we will all be back

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: We went with a group of 10 . Service was wonderful and the food was great!

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: Wonderful service and the food was out of this world. This is in a tourist area but doesn't feel like it all when you get inside. We were a bit early for our reservation but were still seated within seconds of our arrival. I had Chicken Marsala and my wife had Shrimp Fra Diavolo and they were both outstanding. Great experience and can't wait to go back.

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: Celebrating our 49th turned out to be fantastic. Service, food, wine exceeded our expectation. Our waiter brought us a special treat after dinner to celebrate our anniversary. Real nice touch. Thank you for a great evening.

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: very nice place. It was our first time and the service and food was excellent. we will definitely be back on our next trip into Orlando.

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: we had a great time. The service was outstanding, even one of the chef's stopped by, and complemented his work. He had all reasons, because it was excellent.

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: The bar scene is crowded, the noise level high, but the food and service make it all worth it. Our server was efficient and professional. Our dinner was outstanding. And even though it was Christmas Eve, all went very smoothly.

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: We eat at Maggiano's frequently. The food is delicious and consistent. I am pleased with the new Lighter Take selections. Service and ambience are excellent. Whenever we have guests visiting from out of town, we take them to Maggiano's. They are always impressed.

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: This is a great Italian standby. Not high end but if your looking for a good Italian family restaurant, this is a good choice. Economical too.

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: Everyone in our party enjoyed a different meal and it was all delicious! We were greeted with a smile and high energy!!

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: Made last minute reservation via OpenTable while spending a night in Orlando on the way further south. Service and food were excellent.

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: I always enjoy maggiano's when I am in the orlando area. Good atmosphere, good food, and the service is always top notch. Can't wait to visit again.

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: I have been dining at Maggiano's since first visiting the one in Chicago in 2000. The food and the service have always been outstanding. I wish I were closer to one being on the Treasure Coast of Florida but it makes the trip that much more worth it when we go. All the dishes were incredibly tasty and there were plenty of leftovers to take home.

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: Always good service , food and value for money,only wished were in the uk

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: Great dining experience. Reservations a must or there is a 45 minute wait. As always very attentive service, food was superb complimented by a nice pinot noir. Try the soup, it is to die for. Life doesn't get much better. Don't forget the complimentary take home pasta meal if/when you order a classic pasta dish.

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: The food and service were wonderful, however the portions were smaller than in the past. Robert and Noelle were very helpful and took good care of us.

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: Good food and good service. I am never disappointed with Maggiano's.

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: The food was good (not great). The prices are outrageous! The noise level is very loud. The value for your dollar is not there. The value is in the family style menu, but you can only order it for parties of 4 or more. I wanted to order the Family style menu and it was only the two of us. They said the would have to charge us for 2 adults and 2 children to order on the family style menu. Not a good value.

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: The food was very good. Always generous portions. The tables are a bit close together and the noise level was high.

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: Once again Maggiano's exceeded our expectations. The service was very responsive to our needs, explaining the specials and additions to the menu. We relaxed with a drink and then ordered. The food is extraordinary and we enjoyed our dining experience.

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: Chicken pesto isn't on the menu anymore, but they made it for me anyway upon request!! I really appreciated that!

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: Excellent service from the hostess, server and busser. Great food and we look forward to our next visit. Meatballs and spaghetti was awesome and of course the chocolate moose cake; the bomb! Thank you!! Yamily, Chris & Little Gio

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: Anastasia was great and timely. Needed a to go order after our meal and she did a good job of making sure the to go order had all it needed. Bar did a great job of splitting our wine between 2 glasses; didn't need a bottle that night. Food delicious as always! Food exceptional as always at the location

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: food was very good except for the chicken parmigiana. we were however extremely disappointed with our seating arrangements. we had reservations for party of 6 but only 5 chairs at our table when we arrived. we had to leave a space at our table for the back of a guest at the next table. servers asked to move our table over twice after we were seated.

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: Ã“tima comida Italiana, com ambiente aconchegante porÃ©m alegre. O serviÃ§o Ã© muito bom e o preÃ§o muito razoÃ¡vel para a qualidade deste conjunto. Recomendo tanto para grupos como para casais e crianÃ§as.

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: Never a bad meal. Always exceeds expectations. The service is next to none. The food is soooo delicious and the wine and cocktails are excellent. We will return. Love this place. And, there are always leftovers.

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: Every year on our golf trip we always go here. Family style with the guys is a great way to spend an evening. So many good choices we can't order everything.

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: Maggiano's is the most authentic Italian restaurant I have ever been to. The selection and the taste is SOOOO good. The atmosphere is perfection. Needless to say, I loved it all!

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: Took some friends to Maggiano's and had a fabulous dinner. We ordered the family style dinner for the four of us. There was so much delicious food that we couldn't stop eating even though we were stuffed. We had 3 appetizers, 4 entrees and 2 desserts, unbelievable! The price is extremely reasonable, especially considering the Dining scene near the theme parks. We can't wait to go back.

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: Great food, and drinks. Our server was excellent. Nice place

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: The food & service are top notch - ambiance reminds me of some of the Atlantic City "wise guy" haunts. I could easily picture seeing Buggsy Malone at the next table. Prices are very reasonable with huge portions! Great tomato sauce!! cold bowl for cold salad - sadly overlooked way too often

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: The food was amazing. Huge portions and what you want from an Italian restaurant. The service on the other hand was lacking. Our server would rush to the table and talk really quick and then would say do you have questions and then would be off again before we could ask any. My boyfriend and I were both taken aback because we felt very rushed the whole meal.I understand restaurants are busy,but this was a little much.

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: We had to wait a long time for the food but not for the bill. We were not offered Tea or coffee which I discovered is a feature of restaurants in Orlando - no time to linger...next please!!!

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: I was running late due to Orlando traffic and staff at Maggiano's was gracious and was able to seat us when we arrived. Also, they were very attentive and knowledgable concerning food allergens and directed us to appropriate menu choices.

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: Menu changes. Take away low & high end Family Style, keep main dishes in each category, add some lighter versions of the classics, keep the warm crusty bread with creamy butter & favorite desserts & you've got a winning combination every time.

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: We enjoyed the all you can eat for 4 dinner. It was incredible and the service was top notch. The food did not disappoint at all!

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: Great ambiance. Being able to make reservations was pretty awesome. Great menu selection overall a good experience.

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: We visited Maggiano's for the first time as a birthday celebration for my son. We were headed to a Broadway show and wanted to make it a full evening. Maggiano's was definitely the best place to start our evening.

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: Maggiano's is one of our favorites. When we are in Orlando its a must do. Food is always great. My first visit was in Bethesda Maryland about 10 years ago and when ever I travel I look for one of your restaurants.

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: A large room full to tables and booths with red checked table cloths and white napkins. They found our reservation quickly and we were seated shortly thereafter (wait for walk ins was over 1 hour--and the theme parks are at LOW capacity this week.) it's a large room, and was full of people dining. The tables are close together and it's fun to watch the waiters and bus staff maneauver when they are carrying a tall armload of plates. It's fairly difficult to hear conversation here, given how large and open the space is. We were seated at a U-shaped table, which made for great people watching, although the people on the ends couldn't hear anything the other was saying. The waiter was friendly and attentive. The menu is standard--pasta in many shapes and forms, mostly with red sauce. Huge servings. Service was prompt, but not rushed. Food seemed over salted rather than spiced. The sausage served with the gnocci was so salty it was not edible. Pasta with mussells and clams was fresh

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: Excellent food and service. Very noisy and seating very tight.table arrangements....table to table..Felt like we were sitting with our neighbor..very hard to talk.

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: My wife and I both ordered spaghetti meals, hers with marinara sauce and mine with meat sauce. As it was my birthday we used my Birthday discount certificate. As a surprise we were provided a small dessert for the occasion. It was a wonderful meal.

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: Outstanding service with wonderful food portions. We were a party of 7 and ordered 5 different things plus salad for everyone and were pleasantly full. The drinks were also very good. Great experience!

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: wait time was very very long,this might be isolated to this specific restaurant though since it is located in a very touristy spot.waiter was great and very patient with our high energy 3 year old who was all over the place.food quality was excellent from appetizers to entrees.only issue again was that we waited so long for food to arrive.I would definitely repeat again,this time maybe in slow tourist season.

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: We enjoyed the bruschetta, Caesar salad, cheese ravioli and lobster carbonara so much on our first visit, that we had exactly the same thing on our next visit two weeks later! Great service! Great food! Portions are huge.

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: My guest whom we brought expressed on numerous occasions that she was highly impressed.

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: This is a great place on I-drive to take visitors. We ended up trying them out after getting rained out at Disney and were very impressed. This is also a great place for people who want vegetarian/kosher options. Very accommodation to diet restrictions. Excellent Happy Hour, and the food is much better than typical chain faire. The food is great and even the house wine was good. Make a reservation if you want to go for dinner as they tend to get busy at night.

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: We eat here every time we visit Orlando. We now have a Maggianos two hours from home (Nashville), but prefer Orlando. We eat out a lot and it is in our top 5 favorite restaurants.

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: A great experience. I try and have at least oine meal here each time I come to Orlando. The food is the best and the wine knowledge of the wait staff is a real complement to the experience

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: We visited this restaurant during the holidays for a birthday celebration and had a wonderful time. The food was superb and the ambiance was warm and friendly though a little loud at times.

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: Every time I'm in Orlando, I try to make it to Maggiano's. The food is very good, the presentation is nice, and the service is appropiate. They even send you a chef to the table if anyone in your party has an allergy, or any eating restrictions. We will be back next time!

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: i have been to Maggiano's in the past and really enjoyed it. This time both of our dishes were extremely salty. In my fiancÃ©e dish they secretly attempted to replace her polenta with potatoes. Our waiter Vic was overworked with too many large parties. He did the best he could and we do understand dining in Orlando is a challenge this time of year.

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: Great food, great atmosphere and great service at a reasonable price. What more could you want? One of my favorite restaurants in the I Drive tourist area.

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: I had dinner at Maggiano's in Orlando while traveling. It was superb! The food was excellent, as usual and the service was outstanding! Such a nice addition to have service to equal the food.

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: Very accommodating service. Gluten free pasta and sauces. Chef visits table side to discuss dietary issues.

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: We have been coming here for the last three years to spend our anniversary at your great restaurant we have always had a great meal & a great time. Your staff are excellent! Thank you for treating us like fmily.

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: Our Hotel recommended this restaurant to our group. We had the BEST experience!

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: Food was delicious I had the bruchetta appetizer and home made fettucine for an entree And the apple crossata for dessert was to die for I will be back

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: In town looking for a nice romantic dinner and found this place right across from our hotel. Everything was excellent from the food to the drinks to the service. We will definitely visit again! Try the Rigatoni D and the Moscato Mojito!

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: The atmosphere was one of a kind. The employees were very nice and everyone just went out of thier way to make this night special. I have eaten here before with my family and the service was just as amazing. The food was delicious. It was melt in your mouth tastes like heaven food. Will be coming back for more.

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: Orlando during Christmas New Years week. Really crowded everywhere you go. Here for soccer. Open table and maggianos easy to do, got the reservation and had a great meal. This location has several banquet rooms so planning for a large group would be a snap. The food quality was as expected and you know you will never leave a maggianos hungry. In orlando? Eat at maggianos!

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: Reservations were made online, on arrival they knew the reservation and seated us within 1 minute, the wait staff work as team, never miss a customer request, food was wonderful, and portions and pricing were perfect. The Place was beautiful, romantic, and full of conversation.

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: Great food at a great price we love coming here! This is one of our favorite places

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: What a great anniversary dinner at Maggiano's, which was referred to us by a friend who frequents Orlando. This place is great...from the environment of the restaurant to the wine list and full menu, what an amazing experience. Our server, Larry, did an excellent job of catering to us while maintaining his other tables. The entire place was packed at 730 when we arrived, make a reservation in advance as there would have been over a 60 minute wait! opentable.com was a great resource! I would highly recommend visiting Maggiano's during your next trip to Orlando, you won't be disappointed!

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: Had a great dinner. Very nice ambiance. Very romantic. Could not not have been better. Great wine selection, the house wine is excellent. Service was great and on target. Recommend wholeheartedly.

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: We hadn't been to Maggiano's for over 6 months which, to us, is a very long time. We had reservations at 1:00 p.m. and had asked for a specific booth, as well as a specific server. Our server was not in that day and we were told when we arrived that there were people already in the booth we had requested and they were just sitting and talking. They hadn't even ordered dessert yet. They had been there since 11:30 which really wasn't a very long time given that we spend about 2 to 2-1/2 hrs. there every time we go. Our waiter was Jeff. Jeff was very personable and caught on quickly that we had been there before; especially when we ordered the family style menu. The family style menu has changed and they have eliminated a few of our favorites. Plus the pricing has changed inasmuch as there where a few extra dollars (maximum $9.00) per person on several dishes. All in all, we would still recommend Maggiano's to our friends and plan to go back again.

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: My family and I recently had a birthday at Maggianos. It was more than expected with delicious food and great staff. We will definitely come back and have a great time. I would recommend Maggianos to all of my friends.

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: This our second time and both times have been unforgettable, from the food to the service all are top notch, will recommend to anyone that lives good Italian Food and good wine pairing.

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: We came from out of town and were late for our reservation. We came in at 9:20, resos were for 9pm. We explained to the manager, David, that there was unforeseen traffic coming from the airport and since we were from out of town we had no means of contacting the restaurant, but we still wanted to make it, so instead of ditching these reservations and going elsewhere, we honored our reservations here. The manager we spoke to had no customer service skills and said we had to wait another 45 minutes to an hour and were treated as a walk in. I told him this kind of service was unacceptable as he did nothing to accomodate us -- a party of only 2. His apologies were very unsincere.

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: We enjoyed another great meal at Maggiano's Orlando. Valentine's day was very busy but the staff were excellent... made the hard traffic ridden drive there worth it. Food was very good!

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: Every Maggianos we've visited has been great! Orlando's is no exception. Good food every time and wait staff is nice! Be sure to make a reservation no matter how small your party. 1.5 hr wait for 2 on a Friday night. We learned from our first experience and made a reservation thru opentable for our most recent visit. Very convienent and we were seated on time. Thanks, Maggianos and thanks, opentable!!

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: Unbelievable quality of food especially doing the family plan with 4 or more people. Unlimited refills on all dishes and is my favorite Italian food restaurant

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: Great food Great service Would not hesitate to eat there again

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: We are frequent patrons of Maggiano's Pointe Orlando. While I understand that tonight is a holiday and everything is crowded, for Maggiano's this is a normal day. Most of the time when we eat at this restaurant, its packed, inside and out. Our reservation was for 7:30pm, party of 6. We were seated right away. Both our servers introduced themselves, but only 1 of them attended to us the whole evening. When the 2nd would stop by to ask if everything was okay, we'd ask for simple things like more water, or balsamic vinegar. We never saw him again. It was very strange and not the service we're used to expecting at this restaurant. The only thing I could surmise is that maybe they were short staffed due to the holiday, because as far as crowds, this is nothing new for this restaurant. Personally, I don't think I will go for Christmas Eve again due to the lack of service we received tonight based on any other normal night.

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: We were celebrating our son's 10th Birthday . Everything was 5 star and above all our expectations. Our waitress Stephanie, was not only anazing, but had or appetizers, drinks, main courses and deserts , coming before we could even ask. She and all the staff, from Stephanie 's co-workers , whom assisted her and everyone who works at this Orlando Maggianos were not only amazing, but performed like a well oiled machine. It was truly incredible to watch and what a great evening and Birthday my son and family were given. Kudos to Stephanie, her co- workers ,Staff and Management, that made this possible. My family and I afe from Tampa, FL and visit the Orlando area quite often for short week- end get a ways. We have been to our local Maggianos in Tampa, but this Maggianos in Orlando ,is by far the most efficient, enjoyablle, professional, customer oriented restaurant, that I've ever been so taken away, by their service excellent food and customer care. I by far would

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: Perfect dinner after a long day at the parks (with kids) our server was excellent! Food delish! Apps salad and dinner 10+

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: Nice place to have a Diner with my family after shopping or Disney's Parks

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: We stopped for lunch 7 of us with 4 teens, apps where very good, we loved that they offered a lighter meal less calories but kept the portion!! The only bad thing was I Love broccoli steamed in my dishes & they didn't have any, disappointed they don't offer it at all on their menu!

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: Maggiano's continues to deliver authentic "Little Italy" food at great prices. The service was great and the special, Braised Short Ribs" was delicious. Keep up the great standard that you set.

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: The food is fantastic, although the service has a lot to be desired. We finished our starter and before the plates we cleaned away the main were brought to us. I moved my plate so the server could place my main on the table thinking she would then take it away but no she walked off. Good job there was only two of us and we were seated on a table for four. Plates were piled at the side of us with glasses from the drinks we had drunk. We had to ask for the plates to be removed. This is about the fifth time we have been and I'm not sure we will go again. Not one person asked if the food or service was good, it was feed them fast and hope they eat quick and leave, and don't forget your tip for a rubbish service.

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: Our waiter was awesome and so was the food. The setting was not ideal or good for a romantic evening although Ryan tried to set it up for us.

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: Even though it's over an hour from home, we like to visit maggianos on special occasions....it's always a special treat. The food is amazing, the staff is always friendly and accommodating, and the atmosphere is elegant and fun!

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: We enjoyed an excellent family style dinner. All 3 courses were perfectly prepared and served with a smile.

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: Maggiano's is always consistently good food. We have never had a bad meal. The service generally is very good. At times the staff seems over extended and attentiveness is lacking; but for the most part good service. We continue to visit the restaurant 2-3 times a months.

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: Our son was in town for Spring Break and we decided to go back to Maggianos where we had his 16th birthday dinner three years earlier. It was fantastic as always. It is a bit loud, but festive. The service was excellent, but not rushed. This is a fun night out for locals too when you have the time to mix with the area visitors.

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: Absolutely amazing service, food and best yet our waitress. My wife and 2 sons were seated immediately with our reservation. The food was great, drinks prepared correctly. I love this place , always 5 stars.

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: Tais italian restaurant is awesome. Great food, everything is really delicious! Every time I visit Orlando with my family we go to Maggiano's at least once. For dinner it's better make a reservation.

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: The tomato appetizer was the highlight. The Chicken Manicooti just ok if that. Eggplant parmigiana was good. Overall wasn't quite up to previous visits

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: The food was really good. Veal parmigiana was great.

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: Usually enjoy Maggiano's when we go but this time was awful. TERRIBLE service, long wait even after reservations made and walk in's went ahead of us. So many issues. May think about if we are going to go back. They likely do not care as they cater to the high tourism in the area as opposed the residents in the area so this bad review will not have too much impact. Sad to say.

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: The service was excellent. They made our 5 year anniversary dinner special. Robert our server was great.

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: We ask to be moved away from a table that had a number of young yelling children and they had no problem changing our table. Our food came very quickly and was very good, we shared a Creaser Salad which was more than enough with our food. It was very good and fresh. We will for sure return here the next time we visit orlando again. An would reconmmend this restaurant to everyone.

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: We went here for my daughter's 16th birthday. Absolutely loved the chocolate martinis. Great service from Laura and yummy food made her night. Our favorite dish is the Rigatoni D...

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: Loved the food and the service was excellent! Have been there several times and each time has been outstanding. We love to bring our friends and family for dinner and special occasions. Would highly recommend Maggiano's!

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: Been to Maggiano's many times and never been disappointed.

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: I'm doing this on mobile so I apologize in advance for the bad formatting. My family loves Italian but frankly doesn't like to stray too far away from the classic dishes like cheese ravioli with Alfredo sauce or a good potato gnocchi pastawith a classic meat marinara. I on the other hand enjoy the unique tastings of Italian with a lot of flair spice and flavor. Maggiano's had dishes my entire family could enjoy and that is no easy feat. It was so good we came back two days later just to try some new menu items again. The atmosphere was a little noisy. It was close enough to the resorts where you had a lot of tourists dressed in t-shirts that took the atmosphere down a notch. My only real complaint. The prices were extremely reasonable and fits most family budgets. Appetizers were around $10 and most pasta dishes were under $20. I had the Delmonaco steak which was cooked to request and was still in only in the thirties. as I previously alluded to, they have some really great sau

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: It was my first time at Maggianos and it is now my favorite Italian restaurant! I had the chicken piccata and the fried mozzarella for an appetizer. Both were amazing!!

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: Really great authentic/home made food. Great service. Would recommend to anyone.

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: I love Maggianos. The restaurant never lets me down the food is always great, drinks was good and the service was excellent. The food arrived on time.

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: Sat out on the patio deck. 2 waiters dedicated as far as we could see to about 8-10 tables. Shouldn't be a problem, right? This was a fail end to end: 1) Waiters were BS'ing with the next table while we sat there. Table that was seated AFTER us got their order taken first. Fail. 2) Once order was taken, they never took the menus away. They remained on the table the entire meal. Fail. 3) Finished appetizer; waiter never inquired if everything was OK. Fail. 4) Meal came after a wait via food runner; again waiter never checked if everything was OK once we started eating, drinks needed refreshing; nuttin'. Fail. 5) No one ever cleared the entree plates once we were done. They had no problem getting us the bill...we had to move plates aside to complete the bill. Fail. 6) No apologies from the waiters for anything. Fail. 7) Paid the bill...gave them 10% with reluctance and struck Maggianos off our list for a return. As far as food, wife got the margharita flatbread (too much ch

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: Had an amazig night with my now fiancÃ©. It was our second time there. We celebrated our anniversary in Sept and in Feb we celebrated her birthday. Had great service, our waiter DUTCH was on point. Funny guy plus set everything up for me to propose to my future wife. He's awesome and the place is great!! David Figueroa

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: We go to Maggiano's quite often. It's always a great experience. The food is always excellent quality.

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: The lighter fare addition to your menu is much appreciated but, in my opinion, the caloric totals for most of your dishes are way TOO high. As a person who likes to stay fit, I found the choices very limited to the few lighter fare options. I'd like to see that part of the menu expanded.

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: I have been to this restaurant before and I really enjoy it. My overall experience this time wasn't so great. We order shrimp scampi and it didn't have any flavor to it. The Valentine special that they had for the day was not worth it.

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: Food was amazing our server Robert and the whole staff was magnificent.

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: We had One chance for us to get together with my daughters' family for the Holiday. This has been a challenging year for her and her husband. And the gathering had to be a very Special one. My wife and I are familiar with the many qualities of Maggiano's. Whether it is just the two of us, or a repast with the granddaughters. As well, we have seen the efficiency aand the pleasant attitude of the staff while serving weddings and corporate banquets For our Holiday meal, we chose to use the Family Style. We had a Wonderful time, Delicious food, a very accomodating and Friendly waiter. Here, the term 'leftovers' is an injustice. A 'second chance' or, to reLive a memory is much more suitable. We most certinly will continue to dine at Maggiano's in 2015!

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: We have dined here many times over the years. As locals in a tourist town, there are few places we can consistently recommend. This place is one of them. Always a vibrant atmosphere! The food is made from scratch which is amazing considering the size of this place. The staff is spot-on! Half of any great dining experience is the service and this place has never disappointed us.

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: The experience at Maggiano's in Orlando was wonderful. The ambiance is nice but since it is a tourist destination, expect it to be a bit on the loud side. I am not a wine person but the wine list was extensive and menu has a lot of options. The service is very good, the waiters are very knowledgeable. The food was good but I have had better (and much worse). All in all I think it a nice dining experience for a very fair price.

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: Great service. Satisfying food and wonderful atmosphere.

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: Terrific dining experience, food was fantastic, as was our server, Brandon. Will definitely go back next year!

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: Great place to take that special person in your life.

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: Fantastic service from are waitress and food was great!

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: I enjoyed my Christmas Eve there, and had awesome service. She was super sweet and the manager was nice as well. The chef came out to the table and asked if we had any special requests. I told him I was vegan, and he said ok well whatever you want just let them know.. He didn't suggest anything. I just asked the server to make me a sautÃ©ed veggie bowl, I didn't want pasta, so just throw in every vegetable you have back there. Well, the entree was brought out by another server and it was pasta with spinach and tomatoes. I told the waiter who brought it out what I had asked for and he had an attitude. So my server came back and apologized endless and I told her again just have them sautÃ©e every veggie they have in some olive oil and garlic maybe. So it comes out spinach, tomatoes, and barely any asparagus, no garlic... Why no eggplant, broccolini, free beans, mushrooms? I saw many veggies on the menu, just seemed as if the cook didn't care what so ever. Because if he did he would have b

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: I have been to this Maggianos 3 times and I have never been disappointed. This place literally has your entree at your table about 10 minutes after you order. The service also has always been fantastic.

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: Me and my girlfriend went to Maggianos to celebrate Valentine's Day and it was a great decision. From the bruschetta to my Shrimp Diavolo all the food was excellent and i loved that we were able to eat healthier by chooaing the lighter take choices. And our server Dutch was all around Great. It has been a while since i have had attentive service like that. Great spot

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: Meals and service were very good, but noise level makes it very difficult to visit over dinner.

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: Went to restaurant on a Saturday night. It was very busy and I definitely recommend a reservation, it was easy to make online and we waited maybe five minutes to be seated. It was quite noisy, mainly because of a screaming toddler nearby. With that considered, Saturday night may not be the best time for a romantic dinner. On the other hand, it very family friendly. My friends' lasagna and penne dinners were very good, my mussels were just okay. Service was slow and our waitress was noticeably inattentive, even though other waiters in the area seemed to manage just fine. There was just a general lack of effort to communicate, even though she spent quite a bit of time with the table next to us. Since that experience was tied to one person, I would recommend trying out the restaurant and making your own judgement. Order the lasagna.

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: What a wonderful experience our group of 5 had at Maggiano's. From the moment we arrived with our reservation in hand we were greeted and seated. The service was outstanding and our server explained everything on the menu is hand made in their kitchen. Please prepare yourself for large portions of wonderful food with even health conscious varieties available!!!! Thank you for such an extraordinary first experience. We will be back or at least we will find a Maggiano's close to home. P.S. thank you for the Military Discount!

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: In comparison with most of the other well known Italian restaurants in Orlando, Maggianos is a way better choice. A large menu, very friendly (not snooty) service, good wine list, and GREAT prices drive it's popularity. The parking is comped, with a big lot next door, which unfortunately does fill and thus can make parking problematic.

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: Been to Maggianos a lot and I love the food and usually the service is great. This time the service was not up to Maggianos standards and it was very disappointing because I went with my friends for the first time. I talked about Maggianos all the time and they wanted to give it a try.

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: The dinner's here are constantly of high quality and quantity the portions are rather large, consider sharing. I have been here numerous times and have never been disappointed. I shall return when I am in the neighborhood.

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: I've been to the Maggianos in Atlanta, which was fantastic so I assumed this would be just as good, but I was mistaken. There was 5 of us and 3 of the dishes was not good. Two of us also ordered a side dish of spinach which was so salty we couldn't eat it. My son's dish was good which I was happy since it was his birthday. The service was ok but not great. I would not go again to this location.

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: Delicious food. We ordered family style and loved it. Everyone in group really enjoyed the experience and food.

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: First off the resteraunt was extremely busy. Even so, our server was there to greet us and check on us in a timely manner. Not to often but not to scarce, just the perfect amount. He was very generous and polite. For a very busy night our food came extremely fast and the only thing I could say is WOW!! It tasted amazing. They were some of the best crab cakes I had ever eaten. Then to complete the night with the New York style cheesecake, I was in heaven. I plan to visit Maggiano's many more times in the future.

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: We went there in a Wednesday night and didn't wait much because we had a reservation, don't go there without one, you will be waiting for a long time. The ambience is a bit crowded, tables are kind of close to each other. Our sever was nice, but not amazing. I had wine, my husband beer (too warm). We ordered a flatbread that was really good and both plates were very good also. For desert we ordered the sample and I think that was a great price for the amount of desert. Overall food is very good, service is average and ambiance is not that comfortable. Price is not the cheapest one ($50 per person tip included), but it is not super expensive, food flavor make it worth.

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: Great dining experience. Food was delicious. I would have preferred the restaurant lighting be a little dimmer. Our server, Laura, was spectacular. She gave just the right amount of attention without continuously bothering us, she was always available without hovering. Her demeanor was perfect, spoke just enoiugh, gave advice when requested, was so patien and cheerful, just an overall pleasure. All of us noticed and remarked about how professional and skilled she was at perceiving our desires and needs, knowing when to approach us, being available, she had a quiet refined demeanor, very approachable without botherine us. She was very patient and polite. I arrived over an hour before the other two members of my party, went ahead and occupied our reserved table. Laura showed no sign of annoyance or dismay at how long I occupied the table prior to the others arriving and us ordering. She never rushed us, she made sure we were at ease and comfortable about taking our time even t

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: Great food, great service. The dining room was too noisy-very loud. And the tables were too close together, but overall good for a family dinner.

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: The waiter got a drink order wrong and one of the dishes in the party was cold and had to be sent back.

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: I have been to several Maggiano's in different cities. It is always consistently good food, generous portions, and attentive service. The Orlando location was no different.

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: We celebrated my wife's birthday with 5 of is in our party. We were seated near the kitchen exit - so there was LOTS of energy as people were streaming out of the kitchen! It was a super busy night, but we were seated within 15 minutes having made a reservation online. Our waiter was great! He kept us happy with bread, food, drinks and updates along the way. We had the family style serving - and he paced the apps with the entrees and brought seconds as we went! He was wonderful! So even though it was noisy and busy - the food and service was as expected - very good!

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: The evening with friends was great due to the wonderful service & great food! We will most definitely be going back in the near future

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: Loyal customers from the beginning when this restaurant originally opened in Chicago, a teeny, tiny place. Now apparently it has become too big. Could not get the variety flatbread basket, no shrimp cocktail, no farfalle, once staples on the menu and reasons for patronizing the restaurant. Our waiter was the saving grace. HIs name was Donatalle and his assistant Max. I am sure I spelled his name incorrectly, he was a transplant from Eastern Europe and every so pleasant.

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: I've been to magiano in both Detroit and Orlando both are amazing food are superb. Will definitely go to another one if me and my gf goto the states and the city have one there.

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: they had this special where they give you a portion to take home when I visited them in Richmond. I asked if they still had that. They said no but that they would still honor it which is great because I got a whole meal to take home!

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: Restaurante para familia e amigos! imperdÃ­vel! PreÃ§o justo para uma fartura de opÃ§oes e porÃ§Ãµes bem robustas!

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: There is very few restaurants that I enjoy going to in Orlando.. this is one of the few that always has good service and good food. That and the fact that I hate going anywhere on international especially during the winter months when the area is packed with tourists that can not drive they are the only place that I put up with that to go to.

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: A wonderful neighborhood gem with warm decor and an extensive menu. The food is delicious!

review.title: Maggiano's - Orlando - Orlando
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: Christian was our server and he was fantastic. Our table had a special food allergy request which he took care of without issue. My meal was not brought out when everyone else's was, but Christian took care of it immediately and then the manager came out to check on things. The food was fantastic and service even better. If you are not familiar with the area, I strongly recommend reservations and plan on arriving early enough to drive along International Blvd and park in Pointe Parking Garage. Traffic is usually congested close to the restaurant.

text.title: Mon Ami Gabi - Oakbrook - Oak Brook
text.author: OpenTable.com
text.body:
Mon Ami Gabi is a classic French bistro and steakhouse. The traditional menu features classics such as the warm Onion Soup Au Gratin, Frisï¿½e & Bacon Salad with a soft-poached egg and croutons, Roast Chicken grand-mï¿½re style with mushrooms, bacon and pearl onions, as well as the trademark Steak Frites. At lunch, we offer lighter fare including crepes, quiches and seasonal salads. Come in Saturday and Sunday for our weekend brunch, featuring a Build-Your-Own Bloody Mary Bar.
To complement the cuisine, an extensive selection of over 80 boutique French wine varietals are served by the glass or bottle from our signature rolling wine cart.
Please Note: Reservations are taken for indoor seating only. Outdoor seating is available on first-come, first-serve bases.

review.title: Mon Ami Gabi - Oakbrook - Oak Brook
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: Everything was most enjoyable at this bistro. We usually frequent the one in Lincoln Park, but the Oak Brook one is just as pleasant. The Restaurant Week menu was a good value. I would say that they downsized the portions of all three courses to make up for the $22 price tag, but each course was adequately sized. The onion soup is one of the best in town. The steak frites was served just as I order it. The dessert trio was nice. All in all, a pleasant experience.

review.title: Mon Ami Gabi - Oakbrook - Oak Brook
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: as usual the dining experience at a Lettuce restaurant was great.

review.title: Mon Ami Gabi - Oakbrook - Oak Brook
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: I wanted it to be cozy and romantic, more like places I had experienced in Paris. Although the decor was right the vibe was too noisy on a Saturday night.

review.title: Mon Ami Gabi - Oakbrook - Oak Brook
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: Mon Ami is an excellent reprÃ©sentation of French Cuisine. They have a lovely, complete Menu with various options from sandwiches and crepes to main course entrees. Their Onion soup is superb and quite filling. Many side dishes to choose from are interesting and tasty. They make their own sorbets which vary daily and are among the best I've ever had. Come prepared for a leisurely and delightful experience, but make a reservation or you might be disappointed. They are closed from 2:00p.m. to 4:00p.m. during the week, but open for both lunch and dinner. Brunch is available on week-ends starting at 10:00a.m.

review.title: Mon Ami Gabi - Oakbrook - Oak Brook
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: I have enjoyed going to Mon Ami Gabi in a couple of other occasions, both in Chicago and Oak Brook. That is why for this Valentine Day I made reservations way ahead of time to get a French flavor for our special day. Except for the name and wine, there was nothing French about our dinner. We made the mistake of going for the specials, and probably due to the large number of people they had coming the food was pre prepared and tasted like college cafeteria food. The fish my wife ordered was crusted due to the heaters and you could taste it, and had lost its tenderness. I made the mistake of ordering prime rib, and ended up regretting it. The mashed potatoes were like picked from an all-you-can-eat buffet. Definitely not worth the $195 final tab (for two) Also, only after my Bordeaux was I told that it contained mostly merlot, and little cabernet. Will probably go back, but definitely not on a special day when the crowds are huge.

review.title: Mon Ami Gabi - Oakbrook - Oak Brook
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: Always a charming place with great food. It's a regular for us, we love it!

review.title: Mon Ami Gabi - Oakbrook - Oak Brook
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: Always good! One of my top 3 restaurants to go to. Service is good & the food wonderful. Every memory I have there is always a pleasing one!

review.title: Mon Ami Gabi - Oakbrook - Oak Brook
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: I brought my husband to your restaurant for his surprise birthday dinner which I had noted in the online reservation. We were greeted with a "happy birthday" to him immediately upon giving our name to the hostess. The entire staff could not have been more accommodating and attentive and the food was absolutely delicious. We enjoyed a really nice bottle of wine and my husband was given an amazing birthday dessert. A WONDERFUL evening. We will definitely return.

review.title: Mon Ami Gabi - Oakbrook - Oak Brook
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: My family and I really enjoyed it. The place was kind enough to seat us early. The waitress was very accommodating and helpful. The hostess and fellow wait staff were also very nice. They checked our coats and always attended to our needs. Aside from the exceptional waitstaff, the food was great. Lots of great options including a kids menu. I would recommend this place to anyone!

review.title: Mon Ami Gabi - Oakbrook - Oak Brook
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: The food and service are always superb here. This is a place you can go and truly feel waited on and pampered. They "aim to please" and welcome special orders on how you want your food prepared or any dietary needs. You get the professional and personal touch here.

review.title: Mon Ami Gabi - Oakbrook - Oak Brook
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: Our waiter Jeffery was great And is a must to serve you

review.title: Mon Ami Gabi - Oakbrook - Oak Brook
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: Wait staff was knowledgeable and prompt. Good wine list. Fish of the day (char) slightly overcooked but O.K. Brussels sprouts were an excellent side. I would like to go back to try the steak frittes.

review.title: Mon Ami Gabi - Oakbrook - Oak Brook
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: We had a delightful lunch at Mon Ami Gabi. Loved the Restaurant Week Lunch Menu. Our waitress was very helpful selecting wines.

review.title: Mon Ami Gabi - Oakbrook - Oak Brook
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: We've been eating at Mon Ami Gabi for years and it never disappoints. The atmosphere is lively, the service is friendly yet professional, there's something for everyone on the menu (which changes a couple times a year), and the food is very tasty.

review.title: Mon Ami Gabi - Oakbrook - Oak Brook
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: Mon Ami Gabi is a great place to enjoy Dinner in a nice surrounding. The service are always very as is the food and generous drinks. We think their pricing is a good value and their menu fits just about any desires. They are always on time with their reservations. We like the friendly and considerate people that work there.

review.title: Mon Ami Gabi - Oakbrook - Oak Brook
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: I enjoyed my evening at Mon Ami Gabi very much. I was there to celebrate my guest's birthday. I noted in the reservations as such, and upon arrival, she was wished a happy birthday by the host who seated us. The entire restaurant was treated to complimentary french onion soup because of how cold it was outside, which was a very pleasant surprise. We tried two of the cocktails and were quite pleased with them. Our waitress was very friendly and always asking if she could be of assistance with questions or getting us anything. The food was fantastic -- I had the wild boar ragu. We ordered a dessert which was dressed with a candle to celebrate the birthday -- a nice gesture. Then when I received the bill, I was thrilled to see that the dessert was on the house for the birthday. IT was a great treat!

review.title: Mon Ami Gabi - Oakbrook - Oak Brook
review.author: OpenTable.com
review.body: I've eaten at Mon Ami Gabi almost two dozen times over the past few years and, as I told my wife last night after a wonderful meal, it's consistently great and better still it's consistently interesting. The things you like about it -- the ambience, the wait staff, the menu -- keep the overall quality high without stuffy pretense. But there's always something a little different, in a good way. We both had the striped bass with a starter of the lobster bisque. Both off the menu as specials, both exceptional. Sancerre to accompany was perfecto.
